Introduction

Golden Girls (Korean: 골든걸스; Japanese: ゴールデンガールズ) is a South Korean vocal project girl group formed by JYP Entertainment in 2023. They debuted on December 1, 2023, with the digital single “One Last Time”.

On September 21, 2023, KBS2 announced that they would be launching the reality show, Golden Girls, on October 27. The show will bring together four senior female vocalists who will prepare a debut song as a group as well as a debut showcase.
